1:
Oh, sing to Yahweh a new song;\q sing to Yahweh, all the earth.
\q
2:
Sing to Yahweh, bless his name;\q announce his salvation day after day.


\q
3:
Declare his glory among the nations,\q his marvelous deeds among all the nations.
\q
4:
For Yahweh is great and is to be praised greatly.\q He is to be feared above all other gods.


\q
5:
For all the gods of the nations are idols,\q but it is Yahweh who made the heavens.
\q
6:
Splendor and majesty are in his presence.\q Strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.


\q
7:
Ascribe to Yahweh, you clans of peoples,\q ascribe praise to Yahweh for his glory and strength.
\q
8:
Give to Yahweh the glory that his name deserves.\q Bring an offering and come into his courts.


\q
9:
Bow down to Yahweh in the splendor of holiness;\q tremble before him, all the earth.

\q
10:
Say among the nations, "Yahweh reigns."\q The world also is established; it cannot be shaken.
\q He judges the peoples fairly.


\q
11:
Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice;\q let the sea roar and that which fills it shout with joy.
\q
12:
Let the fields rejoice and all that is in them.\q Then let all the trees in the forest shout for joy
\q
13:
before Yahweh, for he is coming.\q He is coming to judge the earth.
\q He will judge the world with righteousness
\q and the peoples with his faithfulness.
